name: Certum
description: Certum is Scotlands' leading provider of IT and telecom services to the SME sector. We are a Microsoft Gold solutions provider and ISO 27001 - Information and Security Management certified. We pride ourselves on our excellent customer service and believe that every company can benefit from an outsourced ICT partner who can deliver a first class service, attention to detail and industry recognised technical excellence. We are head quartered in Glasgow and service clients nationwide.
